channel.title: Need help with item drops and changing exp rates
channel.description: i am useing hiyascape v2 and i cant figure out how to put drops in monsters i have added to the server or how to change the exp rates so it is not so easy to level up. I really need some help. post below if you can or if you can help me with team viewer add me on x fire (tehtaylor5) thanks.

item.title: Need help with item drops and changing exp rates
item.dc:creator: @rcscape rcscape
item.description:
@rcscape wrote:

open up the npcdrop.cfg and paste this in

npcdrop = 3200 1 275 1

the 3200 is the npc id and change 275 to the item you want and the 1 to how many to drop

now to change exp open client.java then search

TotalExp = (double)

then you will see this

TotalExp = (double) (140 * hitDiff);

change the 140 to you likeing hope this helped

cough cough search tuts cough cough

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with item drops and changing exp rates
